SEARCH
Package controller

Class HomepageController

java.lang.Object
controller.HomepageController
public class HomepageController extends Object
HomepageController class to control the homepage view This class is responsible for displaying the albums in the homepage and handling the selection of an album. It also allows the user to delete, rename, create, and open albums. It also allows the user to logout and quit the application. It also allows the user to search for photos.
Author:
jacobjude, ks1686
